Text.Text_Ko: (지난 대화가 애매하게 끝난 탓인지, 어색한 침묵이 흐르고 있다...)
Text.Text_En: (An awkward silence lingers, likely because the previous conversation ended ambiguously...)
...We need to head out quickly today as well.
This time, a monster has appeared in the middle of the city.

Text.Text_Ko: 커다란 늑대 같은 모습에 눈이 네 개나 달렸으니, 알아보기는 쉬울 거야.
Text.Text_En: It looks like a giant wolf with four eyes, so it should be easy to recognize.

Item.Text_En: By the way, about my lost memories...

Item.Text_Ko: 이 사건을 해결하고 오면, 네가 숨기는 것에 대해 말해줘.
Item.Text_En: After I handle this, tell me about what you're hiding.

Text.Text_Ko: ...그래. 이번 임무를 무사히 끝내고 나면, 그때 고민해볼게.
Text.Text_En: ...Alright. Once this mission is over, I'll consider it then.

Text.Text_Ko: 혹시 나한테 숨기고 있는 것 있지 않아?
Text.Text_En: Are you hiding something from me?

Item.Text_En: I'm not obligated to tell you anything.

Text.Text_Ko: ...어쨌든, 이번 일도 잘 해보자. 지금은 임무가 우선이니까.
Text.Text_En: ...Anyway, let's handle this well too. For now, the mission comes first.
